title: Our Programs
description: At Roberto Save Dreams Foundation, we offer various programs designed to empower communities, foster education, and create sustainable development opportunities. Explore our programs below to learn how you can benefit or get involved.

programs.title: Microloans Program
programs.description: Our microloans program provides small business owners and entrepreneurs with access to affordable capital to start or expand their businesses. This program aims to reduce poverty through economic empowerment.
benefits: Low-interest loans with flexible repayment terms
Business mentorship and guidance from experienced entrepreneurs
Networking opportunities with other business owners
eligibility: Must have a viable business plan or existing small business
Must demonstrate commitment to business growth
Must complete our basic financial literacy training

programs.title: Scholarship Program
programs.description: Our scholarship program supports deserving students who have demonstrated academic excellence but lack the financial means to pursue higher education. We believe that education is a powerful tool for transformation.
benefits: Full or partial coverage of tuition fees
Mentorship from professionals in chosen field
eligibility: Must maintain a minimum GPA of 3.0
Must show commitment to community service
Must be enrolled or accepted in an accredited institution

programs.title: Community Development Initiative
programs.description: Our community development initiative focuses on sustainable projects that address local needs, from clean water access to infrastructure improvement. We work closely with community leaders to ensure projects have lasting impact.
benefits: Job creation opportunities for local residents
eligibility: Projects must address a demonstrated community need
Communities must show commitment to project sustainability
Project must benefit a significant portion of the community
Community must have a plan for ongoing maintenance
